edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.util

Interface AudioFileProcessListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable

    public interface AudioFileProcessListener
extends Configurable
    An interface which is describes the functionality which is required to handle new file signals fired by the audio-data sources.
    Author:
    Holger Brandl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void audioFileProcFinished(java.io.File audioFile)
      This method is invoked whenever a file processing has finished within a audio file data source.
      void audioFileProcStarted(java.io.File audioFile)
      This method is invoked whenever a new file is started to become processed by an audio file data source.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.cmu.sphinx.util.props.Configurable

        newProperties

    • Method Detail

      • audioFileProcStarted

        void audioFileProcStarted(java.io.File audioFile)
        This method is invoked whenever a new file is started to become processed by an audio file data source.
        Parameters:
        audioFile - The name of the new audio file.

      • audioFileProcFinished

        void audioFileProcFinished(java.io.File audioFile)
        This method is invoked whenever a file processing has finished within a audio file data source.
        Parameters:
        audioFile - The name of the processed audio file.
